strings.report.alt: Schematron contact-information is at the end of this page
strings.title: Schematron validation for ISO 19115(19139)
strings.M6: CharacterString must have content or it's parent must have a valid nilReason attribute.
strings.M13: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row10] - content mandatory for dataset or series
strings.M14: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row11] - source required if no statement or processStep
strings.M15: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row12] - processStep required if no statement or source
strings.M16: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row08] - dataset must have report or lineage
strings.M17: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row09] - levelDescription needed unless dataset or series
strings.M22: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row05] - dataset or series must have topicCategory
strings.M23: [ISOFTDS19139:2005-TableA1-Row06] - either aggregateDataSetName or aggregateDataSetIdentifier must be documented
strings.source:
Schematron Report by David Carlisle.
The Schematron by Rick Jelliffe, Academia Sinica Computing Centre.
topicCategory is mandatory if MD_Metadata.hierarchyLevel equal 'dataset' or 'series' or doesn't exist.
strings.alert.M6.characterString: CharacterString must have content or parent's nilReason attribute must be legitimate.
strings.alert.M6.directPosition: The presence of a dimension attribute implies the presence of the srsName attribute.
strings.alert.M7.axisAndSrs: The presence of an axisLabels attribute implies the presence of the srsName attribute.
strings.alert.M7.uomAndSrs: The presence of an uomLabels attribute implies the presence of the srsName attribute.
strings.alert.M7.uomAndAxis: The presence of an uomLabels attribute implies the presence of the axisLabels attribute and vice versa.
strings.alert.M8: You must specify one or more of individualName, organisationName or positionName.
strings.alert.M9.access: otherConstraints: documented if accessConstraints or useConstraints = 'otherRestrictions.'
strings.alert.M9.use: otherConstraints: documented if accessConstraints or useConstraints = 'otherRestrictions.'
strings.alert.M9: 'units' is mandatory if 'maxValue' or 'minValue' are provided.
strings.alert.M11: 'description' is mandatory if 'sourceExtent' is not documented.
strings.alert.M12: 'description' is mandatory if 'sourceExtent' is not documented.
strings.alert.M13: If(count(source) + count(processStep) =0) and (DQ_DataQuality.scope.level = 'dataset' or 'series') then statement is mandatory.
strings.alert.M14: 'source' role is mandatory if LI_Lineage.statement and 'processStep' role are not documented.
strings.alert.M15: 'processStep' role is mandatory if LI_Lineage.statement and 'source' role are not documented.
strings.alert.M16: 'report' or 'lineage' role is mandatory if scope.DQ_Scope.level = 'dataset'.
strings.alert.M21: MD_Metadata.hierarchyLevel = 'dataset' (i.e. the default value of this property on the parent) implies count (extent.geographicElement.EX_GeographicBoundingBox) + count (extent.geographicElement.EX_GeographicDescription) >=1.
strings.alert.M26.obligation: if 'dataType' notEqual 'codelist', 'enumeration' or 'codelistElement' then 'obligation' is mandatory.
strings.alert.M26.maximumOccurence: if 'dataType' notEqual 'codelist', 'enumeration' or 'codelistElement' then 'maximumOccurence' is mandatory.
strings.alert.M26.domainValue: if 'dataType' notEqual 'codelist', 'enumeration' or 'codelistElement' then 'domainValue' is mandatory.
strings.alert.M29: if 'dataType' not equal to 'codelistElement' then 'shortName' is mandatory.
strings.M45: [INSPIRE] - Conditions for access and use is mandatory
strings.M46: [INSPIRE] - Limitations on public access is mandatory
strings.M48: [INSPIRE] - Metadata point of contact is mandatory
strings.M51: [INSPIRE] (service) - Coupled resource is mandatory if linkage to data sets on which the service operates are available
strings.M52: [INSPIRE] - Resource locator is mandatory if linkage is available
strings.M53: [INSPIRE] - There may be zero or one condition applying to access and use
strings.M54: [INSPIRE] - The value of accessConstraints is otherRestrictions, if and only if they are instances of otherConstraints expressing limitations on public access
strings.M55: [INSPIRE] (data sets and series) - Resource language is mandatory if the resource includes textual information
strings.M56: [INSPIRE] - Spatial resolution is mandatory if an equivalent scale or a resolution distance can be specified
strings.alert.M38: INSPIRE - Unique resource identifier is mandatory
strings.alert.M39: INSPIRE - ISO topic category is mandatory
strings.alert.M41: INSPIRE - Geographic bounding box is mandatory
strings.alert.M45: INSPIRE - Conditions for access and use is mandatory
strings.alert.M46: INSPIRE - Limitations on public access is mandatory
strings.alert.M48: INSPIRE - Metadata point of contact is mandatory
strings.alert.M51: INSPIRE (service) - Coupled resource is mandatory if linkage to data sets on which the service operates are available
strings.alert.M52: INSPIRE - Resource locator is mandatory if linkage is available
strings.alert.M53: INSPIRE - There may be zero or one condition applying to access and use
strings.alert.M54: INSPIRE - The value of accessConstraints is otherRestrictions, if and only if they are instances of otherConstraints expressing limitations on public access
strings.alert.M55: INSPIRE (data sets and series) - Resource language is mandatory if the resource includes textual information
strings.alert.M56: INSPIRE - Spatial resolution is mandatory if an equivalent scale or a resolution distance can be specified
